attributes.action: privatise the NHS by making only emergency care available at a 'free at point of access' basis, and all other non-emergency treatment to be carried out in a 'means-tested' manner by insurance based private companies who will 'buy out' the NHS and all of it's property, staff etc.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For an improved, more effecient health service which will allow for cheap, effective and successful treatments and clean hospitals.
